PreyBehavior Class Reference

Base Prey behavior class. Behaviors don't associate themselves with a specific state. That is up to the BehaviorFamily to associate a Behavior with an animal state. More...

#include <PreyBehavior.h>

 Update the associated Owner using the Behavior.

Detailed Description

Base Prey behavior class. Behaviors don't associate themselves with a specific state. That is up to the BehaviorFamily to associate a Behavior with an animal state.

virtual void PreyBehavior::update ( Prey *  owner,
const std::list< Predator * > &  movedPredators,
const std::list< Predator * > &  stateChangedPredators 
) [pure virtual]

Update the associated Owner using the Behavior.

Parameters:
owner The Prey using the Behavior.
movedPredators The list containing all predator animals that moved in the last update cycle.
stateChangedPredators The list containing all predator animals whose state changed during the last update cycle.

Implemented in AlertPrey, CarefulPrey, DefensivePrey, GenericPreyBehavior, and RandomFleePrey.
